title: [Neuroscience] Language learning difficulties in children linked to brain differences. Children with DLD have less myelin in parts of the brain responsible for acquiring rules and habits, as well as those responsible for language production and comprehension.

[Health] Genetic and Environmental Contribution to the Co-Occurrence of Endocrine-Metabolic Disorders and Depression: A Nationwide Swedish Study of Siblings -- Individuals with endocrine-metabolic disorders had a significantly higher risk of depression, odds ratios 1.43 -> Graves Disease, 3.48 -> T2DM
